evidence.claim: Staffency utilizes AWS for hosting and cloud services.
The company is HIPAA compliant, ensuring health data security and privacy.
Staffency implements FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Staffency integrates with Azure to enhance data management capabilities.
The platform supports cloud integration patterns to streamline workflows.
